db:abstract.db:para: The Qt Platform Headers module offers header-only inline classes that encapsulate platform-specific information that is tied to a given runtime configuration of a platform plugin.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Platform Headers module offers header-only inline classes that encapsulate platform-specific information that is tied to a given runtime configuration of a platform plugin.

db:listitem.db:para: A class encapsulating a Cocoa NSOpenGLContext.
The QWindowsWindowFunctions class is an inline class containing miscellaneous functionality for Windows window specific functionality.
The QXcbWindowFunctions class is an inline class containing miscellaneous functionality for xcb window specific functionality.
